short_summary: Vessel Charter services for fishery officers to monitor compliance in waters of the Northumberland Strait
description: # Vessel Charter services for fishery officers to monitor compliance in waters of the Northumberland Strait. This is an open tender, with the condition that it may be set aside under the Government of Canada's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses who are certified under the PSIB criteria and listed in the Government of Canada's Indigenous Business Directory. Duration: From contract award to November 30, 2023. #
full_summary:
---

### Passenger Vessel Rental Announcement

**Title:** Passenger Vessel for Hire by Fisheries and Oceans Canada for Patrols in the Northumberland Strait (Nova Scotia)

**Reference Number:** CB-7567-48089653
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** 30004684
**Publication Date:** July 25, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** August 16, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Description:**

Fisheries and Oceans Canada seeks proposals for the charter of a passenger vessel to provide a platform for fishery officers to conduct surveillance and enforcement activities in the waters of the Northumberland Strait adjacent to Nova Scotia. The successful bidder will be required to provide a vessel capable of transporting fishery officers and their equipment.

**Duration:**

The charter period will commence upon contract award and will conclude on November 30, 2023 (approximately 18 sea days).

**Notice Type:**
This is an open tender invitation, which may be conditionally set-aside for Indigenous businesses under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids are received from certified Indigenous businesses.

**Important Documents:**

The tender package includes a Request for Proposal (RFP) document, which can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7567/30004684---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7567/30004684---rfp.pdf) and an amendment to the tender notice, which can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7567/30004684---addendum-addenda1.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7567/30004684---addendum-addenda1.pdf).

**Contact Information:**

For questions and clarifications regarding this tender, please contact:
Marie-France Chrétien
Email: [marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:marie-france.chretien@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: (450) 521-4448
Address: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, NB E3C 2M6, Canada
